pages.text: $(bgreen)Marigold$() spends lots of time deciding what kind of coin to spit. She thinks about it, weighs the angles. She does solid research and keeps up with current publications. That's how winners stay ahead.$(br)$(byellow)Sun Cost$() : $(l)50$()$(br)$(bblue)Recharge$() : $(l)Normal$()$(br)$(l)Features$() : It is a $(l)producer$() plant that generate $(borange)coin$() every 60 seconds. it can be $(bred)copper or silver or gold$() one.
$(bgreen)Plant Food : $()It will instantly generate several coin, $(l)at least one gold coin$().
